plain_english_summary:
# Strategy: Anansi Portfolio | Public | 2025-03-01
Source: https://app.composer.trade/symphony/rUAat5i8upzD6sAjvUHo/details

**Complexity**: High (9/10)
**Category**: Tactical

## Trading Universe
This strategy can trade 64 assets:

• **Stocks**: SPY, VIXY, BTAL, IOO, VGT, VTV, VOX, VCR, XLP, XLF, SOXX, QQQ, TLT, IAU, TQQQ, QLD, SOXL, XLK, KMLM, FTLS, UUP, PSQ, SMH, VUG, BND, BIL, EUM, IGSB, XLG, CORP, IDU, USIG, DOG, OEF, TMF, IEF, QQQE, UVXY, TECL, VOOG, VOOV, XLY, FAS, SPXL, LQD, TIP, IGIB, COST, MO, LLY, NVO, PGR, COKE, SHY, EEM, EDC, USRT, EDZ, DIA, ISCB, IWM, DLN, SHV, IEI

## Strategy Settings
• **Rebalancing**: Daily
• **Initial Capital**: USD 100,000
• **Trading Fees**: 0.10% per trade

## Investment Logic

```
• Equal Weight Allocation:
  ◦ Anansi Portfolio | Public | 2025-03-01:
    ▪ Weighted allocation (total: 100.0%)
      - US Equities:
        - Weighted allocation (total: 100.0%)
          - Complex Logic + Frontrunners:
            - Weighted allocation (total: 100.0%)
              - KMLM Signals:
                - Equal Weight Allocation:
                  - If :
                    - If SPY's RSI (Relative Strength Index) (10-day) is greater than 79.0:
                      - Scale-In - 60d:
                        - Equal Weight Allocation:
                          - If :
                            - If VIXY's RSI (Relative Strength Index) is greater than 40.0:
                              - VIX Blend | 75/25:
                                - Weighted allocation (total: 100.0%)
                                  - Buy VIXY (75% of portfolio)
                                  - Buy BTAL (25% of portfolio)
                            - Else branch:
                              - VIX Blend | 50/50:
                                - Equal Weight Allocation:
                                  - Buy VIXY (100% of portfolio)
                                  - Buy BTAL (25% of portfolio)
                    - Else branch:
                      - Equal Weight Allocation:
                        - If :
                          - If IOO's RSI (Relative Strength Index) is greater than 79.0:
                            - Step Up:
                              - Equal Weight Allocation:
                                - If :
                                  - If IOO's RSI (Relative Strength Index) (10-day) is greater than 80.0:
                                    - VIX Blend | 50/50:
                                      - Equal Weight Allocation:
                                        - Buy VIXY (100% of portfolio)
                                        - Buy BTAL (25% of portfolio)
                                  - Else branch:
                                    - Buy BTAL (100% of portfolio)
                          - Else branch:
                            - Equal Weight Allocation:
                              - If :
                                - If VGT's RSI (Relative Strength Index) is greater than 79.0:
                                  - VIX Blend | 50/50:
                                    - Equal Weight Allocation:
                                      - Buy VIXY (100% of portfolio)
                                      - Buy BTAL (100% of portfolio)
                                - Else branch:
                                  - Equal Weight Allocation:
                                    - If :
                                      - If VTV's RSI (Relative Strength Index) (10-day) is greater than 79.0:
                                        - VIX Blend | 50/50:
                                          - Equal Weight Allocation:
                                            - Buy VIXY (100% of portfolio)
                                            - Buy BTAL (100% of portfolio)
                                      - Else branch:
                                        - Equal Weight Allocation:
                                          - If :
                                            - If VOX's RSI (Relative Strength Index) (10-day) is greater than 78.0:
                                              - VIX Blend | 50/50:
                                                - Equal Weight Allocation:
                                                  - Buy VIXY (100% of portfolio)
                                                  - Buy BTAL (100% of portfolio)
                                            - Else branch:
                                              - Equal Weight Allocation:
                                                - If :
                                                  - If VCR's RSI (Relative Strength Index) is greater than 80.0:
                                                    - VIX Blend | 50/50:
                                                      - Equal Weight Allocation:
                                                        - Buy VIXY (100% of portfolio)
                                                        - Buy BTAL (100% of portfolio)
                                                  - Else branch:
                                                    - Equal Weight Allocation:
                                                      - If :
                                                        - If XLP's RSI (Relative Strength Index) (10-day) is greater than 76.0:
                                                          - VIX Blend | 50/50:
                                                            - Equal Weight Allocation:
                                                              - Buy VIXY (100% of portfolio)
                                                              - Buy BTAL (100% of portfolio)
                                                        - Else branch:
                                                          - Equal Weight Allocation:
                                                            - If :
                                                              - If XLF's RSI (Relative Strength Index) (10-day) is greater than 80.0:
                                                                - Step Up:
                                                                  - Equal Weight Allocation:
                                                                    - If :
                                                                      - If XLF's RSI (Relative Strength Index) (10-day) is greater than 81.0:
                                                                        - VIX Blend | 50/50:
                                                                          - Equal Weight Allocation:
                                                                            - Buy VIXY (100% of portfolio)
                                                                            - Buy BTAL (100% of portfolio)
                                                                      - Else branch:
                                                                        - Buy BTAL (100% of portfolio)
                                                              - Else branch:
                                                                - Equal Weight Allocation:
                                                                  - If :
                                                                    - If SOXX's RSI (Relative Strength Index) is greater than 83.0:
                                                                      - Buy BTAL (100% of portfolio)
                                                                    - Else branch:
                                                                      - Equal Weight Allocation:
                                                                        - If :
                                                                          - If SPY's RSI (Relative Strength Index) is greater than 62.0:
                                                                            - Overbought:
                                                                              - Equal Weight Allocation:
                                                                                - VIX or Not:
                                                                                  - Equal Weight Allocation:
                                                                                    - If :
                                                                                      - If QQQ's RSI (Relative Strength Index) is greater than 60.0:
                                                                                        - VIX Blend | 50/50:
                                                                                          - Equal Weight Allocation:
                                                                                            - Buy VIXY (100% of portfolio)
                                                                                            - Buy BTAL (100% of portfolio)
                                                                                      - Else branch:
                                                                                        - Equal Weight Allocation:
                                                                                          - Select the top 1 asset by RSI (Relative Strength Index) (10-day) from: TLT, IAU
                                                                                - Buy IAU (100% of portfolio)
                                                                          - Else branch:
                                                                            - Equal Weight Allocation:
                                                                              - If :
                                                                                - If TQQQ's RSI (Relative Strength Index) (10-day) is less than 30.0:
                                                                                  - Buy QLD (100% of portfolio)
                                                                                - Else branch:
                                                                                  - Equal Weight Allocation:
                                                                                    - If :
                                                                                      - If SOXL's RSI (Relative Strength Index) (10-day) is less than 30.0:
                                                                                        - Buy QLD (100% of portfolio)
                                                                                      - Else branch:
                                                                                        - KMLM Signals:
                                                                                          - Equal Weight Allocation:
                                                                                            - XLK/KMLM:
                                                                                              - Equal Weight Allocation:
                                                                                                - If :
                                                                                                  - If XLK's RSI (Relative Strength Index) is greater than KMLM's RSI (Relative Strength Index):
                                                                                                    - Equal Weight Allocation:
                                                                                                      - If :
                                                                                                        - If KMLM's current-price is less than KMLM's moving-average-price:
                                                                                                          - Buy TQQQ (100% of portfolio)
                                                                                                        - Else branch:
                                                                                                          - Buy QQQ (100% of portfolio)
                                                                                                  - Else branch:
                                                                                                    - Rotator:
                                                                                                      - Equal Weight Allocation:
                                                                                                        - Select the bottom 1 asset by standard-deviation-return (10-day) from: FTLS, KMLM, UUP
                                                                                                    - Buy PSQ (100% of portfolio)
                                                                                            - SMH/KMLM:
                                                                                              - Equal Weight Allocation:
                                                                                                - If :
                                                                                                  - If SMH's RSI (Relative Strength Index) is greater than KMLM's RSI (Relative Strength Index):
                                                                                                    - Equal Weight Allocation:
                                                                                                      - If :
                                                                                                        - If KMLM's current-price is less than KMLM's moving-average-price:
                                                                                                          - Buy TQQQ (100% of portfolio)
                                                                                                        - Else branch:
                                                                                                          - Buy QQQ (100% of portfolio)
                                                                                                  - Else branch:
                                                                                                    - Rotator:
                                                                                                      - Equal Weight Allocation:
                                                                                                        - Select the bottom 1 asset by standard-deviation-return (10-day) from: FTLS, KMLM, UUP
                                                                                                    - Buy PSQ (100% of portfolio)
                                                                                            - SPY/KMLM:
                                                                                              - Equal Weight Allocation:
                                                                                                - If :
                                                                                                  - If SPY's RSI (Relative Strength Index) is greater than KMLM's RSI (Relative Strength Index):
                                                                                                    - Equal Weight Allocation:
                                                                                                      - If :

                                                                                                          - Buy QQQ (100% of portfolio)

                                                                                                      - Equal Weight Allocation:

                                                                                                    - Buy PSQ (100% of portfolio)
              - FTLT Signals:

                      - Scale-In - 60d:
                        - Equal Weight Allocation:
                          - If :
                            - If VIXY's RSI (Relative Strength Index) is greater than 40.0:
                              - VIX Blend | 75/25:

                                  - Buy VIXY (75% of portfolio)
                                  - Buy BTAL (25% of portfolio)
                            - Else branch:
                              - VIX Blend | 50/50:
                                - Equal Weight Allocation:
                                  - Buy VIXY (100% of portfolio)
                                  - Buy BTAL (25% of portfolio)

                                        - Buy BTAL (25% of portfolio)

                                            - Buy VIXY (100% of portfolio)
                                            - Buy BTAL (100% of portfolio)

                                                                              - If :

                                                                                    - If :

                                                                                      - Else branch:
                                                                                        - FTLT | Anansi Signals:
                                                                                          - Equal Weight Allocation:
                                                                                            - If :
                                                                                              - If SPY's current-price is greater than SPY's moving-average-price:
                                                                                                - Bull:
                                                                                                  - Equal Weight Allocation:
                                                                                                    - BND/BIL - 60d:
                                                                                                      - Equal Weight Allocation:
                                                                                                        - If :
                                                                                                          - If BND's RSI (Relative Strength Index) is greater than BIL's RSI (Relative Strength Index):

                                                                                                          - Else branch:
                                                                                                            - Buy UUP (100% of portfolio)
                                                                                                            - Buy EUM (100% of portfolio)
                                                                                                    - IGSB/XLG - 30d:
                                                                                                      - Equal Weight Allocation:
                                                                                                        - If :
                                                                                                          - If IGSB's RSI (Relative Strength Index) is greater than XLG's RSI (Relative Strength Index):

                                                                                                          - Else branch:
                                                                                                            - Buy UUP (100% of portfolio)
                                                                                                            - Buy EUM (100% of portfolio)
                                                                                                    - CORP/IDU - 10d:
                                                                                                      - Equal Weight Allocation:
                                                                                                        - If :

                                                                                                            - Buy TQQQ (100% of portfolio)

                                                                                                            - Buy UUP (100% of portfolio)
                                                                                                            - Buy EUM (100% of portfolio)
                                                                                                    - USIG/DOG - 10d:

                                                                                                            - Buy EUM (100% of portfolio)

                                                                                                                        - If BND's RSI (Relative Strength Index) is greater than SPY's RSI (Relative Strength Index):
```
